title: Detox + Balance Selfcare Set | LUMINOUS ADVANCED AESTHETICS and WELLNESS
description: Take 10 to detox and balance skin with this two-step selfcare facial.Step 1: Brighten, smooth and clarify with NEW Pro 5 Liquid Exfoliant.Formulated with gentle alpha and poly hydroxy acids to impart an instant glow and radiance over time, this exfoliating elixir boosts the effectiveness of masks and serumsStep 2: Detox and refine with Charcoal Detox Mask. Powered by charcoal, kaolin and bentonite clay this double duty detoxing clay mask + exfoliating skin scrub resets skin for a clearer tomorrow
cleaned_text: Set | LUMINOUS ADVANCED AESTHETICS and WELLNESS
